mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linker.card (title, u_id, cl_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{u_id}, #{cl_id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS c_id , c.u_id AS c_u_id , c.title AS c_title , CASE WHEN c.content IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN c.content = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS content , c.cdate AS c_cdate , c.udate AS c_udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id AS c_ps_id , cl.p_id , uhc.status , reply , file FROM linker.card c INNER JOIN linker.cardlist cl ON c.cl_id=cl.id LEFT JOIN linker.user_has_card uhc ON cl.p_id = uhc.p_id AND c.id = uhc.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS reply FROM linker.c_reply GROUP BY c_id) AS r ON c.id = r.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS file FROM linker.c_file GROUP BY c_id) AS f ON c.id = f.c_id WHERE cl.p_id = #{p_id} AND c.ps_id = #{ps_id} ORDER BY c.udate DESC

SELECT c.id AS c_id , c.u_id AS c_u_id , c.title AS c_title , CASE WHEN c.content IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN c.content = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS content , c.cdate AS c_cdate , c.udate AS c_udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id AS c_ps_id , cl.p_id , uhc.status , reply , file FROM linker.card c INNER JOIN linker.cardlist cl ON c.cl_id=cl.id LEFT JOIN linker.user_has_card uhc ON cl.p_id = uhc.p_id AND c.id = uhc.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS reply FROM linker.c_reply GROUP BY c_id) AS r ON c.id = r.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS file FROM linker.c_file GROUP BY c_id) AS f ON c.id = f.c_id WHERE cl.p_id = #{p_id} AND c.cl_id = #{cl_id} AND c.ps_id = 1 ORDER BY c_id ASC

SELECT c.id , c.u_id , c.title , c.content , CASE WHEN c.content IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN c.content = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS checkContent , c.cdate , c.udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id , cl.p_id , cl.ps_id AS cl_ps_id , u.nickname , u.profile , uhc.status , reply , file FROM linker.card c INNER JOIN linker.cardlist cl ON c.cl_id = cl.id INNER JOIN linker.user u ON c.u_id = u.id LEFT JOIN linker.user_has_card uhc ON c.id = uhc.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS reply FROM linker.c_reply GROUP BY c_id) AS r ON c.id = r.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS file FROM linker.c_file GROUP BY c_id) AS f ON c.id = f.c_id WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT f.id , f.file , f.c_id , c.ps_id , f.cdate , f.size FROM linker.c_file f LEFT JOIN linker.card c ON f.c_id = c.id WHERE c_id = #{c_id} ORDER BY f.cdate DESC

INSERT INTO linker.user_has_card(u_id, t_id, p_id, cl_id, c_id) VALUES (#{u_id}, #{t_id}, #{p_id}, #{cl_id}, #{c_id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS c_id , c.u_id AS c_u_id , c.title AS c_title , c.cdate AS c_cdate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id AS c_ps_id , cl.p_id , CASE WHEN c.content IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN c.content = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS content , uhc.status , reply , file FROM linker.user_has_card AS uhc JOIN linker.card AS c ON uhc.c_id = c.id JOIN linker.cardlist AS cl ON uhc.cl_id = cl.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS reply FROM linker.c_reply GROUP BY c_id) AS r ON c.id = r.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_id, count(*) AS file FROM linker.c_file GROUP BY c_id) AS f ON c.id = f.c_id WHERE uhc.u_id = #{u_id} AND uhc.p_id = #{p_id} AND c.ps_id = 1 ORDER BY uhc.cdate ASC
